exits.description: the grasslands lie to the north.

description: the land juts out into the sea here, you can go no further.
investigationDescription: you have walked out to where the land meets the sea. it surrounds you on all sides. broken shells lie in the sand. you and Tei spend time here, feeling the comfort of each other's presence.

exits.description: the land juts out into the sea here, you can go no further. the grasslands lie to the north.

description: the land juts out into the sea here, you can go no further.
investigationDescription: total darkness on all sides, the sounds of the sea fill your head. best not to stay here too long.

exits.description: the land juts out into the sea here, you can go no further. the grasslands lie to the north.

description: the land juts out into the sea here, you can go no further.
investigationDescription: the eye of night illuminates the sea, but the sea is restless, as if something has disturbed its slumber.

exits.description: the land juts out into the sea here, you can go no further. the grasslands lie to the north.

description: the land juts out into the sea here, you can go no further.
investigationDescription: walking out to the edge of this peninsula, surrounded on all sides by the sea, you can't help but think of a large wave crashing over the sand and sweeping you away.

exits.description: the land juts out into the sea here, you can go no further. the grasslands lie to the north.

description: this is the wrong direction, the beast is to the east.
investigationDescription: you do not feel compelled to look around, it is time for the hunt.

exits.description: the land juts out into the sea here, you can go no further. the grasslands lie to the north.

description: the land juts out into the sea here, you can go no further.
investigationDescription: you don't have the energy to look around and carry the carcass. you should head home.

exits.description: the land juts out into the sea here, you can go no further. the grasslands lie to the north.

description: it is terribly dark. the sea is restless. it surrounds you on all sides in this part of the shore.
investigationDescription: this place is unwelcoming, and Tei will not be found here.

description: the sea churns in the strong wind. it encroaches upon the sand. threatening to sweep you away.
investigationDescription: there are no signs that Nua and Onah were here.

description: the sea churns in the strong wind. it encroaches upon the sand. threatening to sweep you away.

exits.description: the land juts out into the sea here, you can go no further. the grasslands lie to the north.

description:
Tei sits on the sand. it is just you and them, surrounded by the sea. 

you can feel your desire for the orb itching at the back of your mind.
investigationDescription: you can still see some of the footprints from the last time you were here with Tei. despite the chill in the wind, the orb at the back of your mind, you feel comfort.
